page.title: 08Llandudno:Shopping centre(2)
page.content: When asked what people particularly liked about Llandudno, 50% said that it was a{good shopping centre; }30% liked the town's{unspoilt character {and pleasant layout. When asked about the town's faults, 40% said it was very difficult to find {parking spaces}close to the main shopping streets; 20% said that there were{insufficient toilets,}especially outside the tourist season. Many of the toilets are locked for the winter. Other dislikes stated included: {fouling of pavements by dogs, windy {weather, tourists, and seagulls.
